description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested 25 CFSD, Montreal by 31 October 2023.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Announcement ID: W8485-247726/A

The Department of National Defence invites bids for the procurement of hydraulic machinery and equipment, including a time tester pump and associated parts.

#### Request for Proposal

The procurement details are as follows:

* **Tender Description**: DND requires the delivery of 23 units of a time tester pump (GSIN: 4320, NSN: 4320-00-303-1088), along with two other items detailed in the bid solicitation document.
* **Contract Dates**:
	+ Expected Contract Start Date: September 28, 2023
	+ Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024
* **Regions of Delivery**: Quebec (except National Capital Region)
* **Trade Agreements**: The procurement is subject to the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and other trade agreements (listed in the tender announcement).

#### Tender Documents

Tender documents can be accessed online via the Canada Buys portal. Please note that the Department of National Defence encourages electronic submission of bids using epost Connect due to reduced business hours and limited staff available.

#### Selection Criteria

The selection criteria for the procurement are as follows:

* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

#### Contracting Entity

The contracting entity for this procurement is DND. The contact information for the contracting entity is as follows:

* **Name**: Debbie Bergeron
* **Email**: debbie.bergeron@forces.gc.ca
* **Phone**: (Available upon request)

#### Tender Closing Date

The tender closing date is August 15, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. Eastern Daylight Time. Late submissions will not be accepted.

#### Compliance with Requirements

To ensure compliance with the requirements outlined in this tender announcement, bidders must submit bids that meet the specific specifications and standards outlined in the bid solicitation document.

**Important:** This procurement is subject to the requirements outlined in the bid solicitation document, specifically with regard to COVID-19 related impacts on business hours and limited staff available. Bidders are encouraged to transmit their bids electronically to ensure timely submission. If you have any query, you can reach out to the specified department representative.
